content: in the ends the beanie is finished and ready for gentle washing and wearing video tutorials the first link is the right handed version the second the left handed steps 3-4 repeat this action by going through the return pass chain tunisian simple stitches and under the stitch on one side https //youtu be/bn2tzhl_vtu then under the stitch on the other https //youtu be/qm3hzd5ix0g side tunisian knit stitches https //youtu be/pbbcliwiolo https //youtu be/fhatg-rfxsy tunisian reverse purl knit stitches https //youtu be/r5z0y73djsk https //youtu be/kql1hnt1ko4 weaving in ends https //youtu be/hq2mnjuwuyq https //youtu be/5gvfo_fbvvu andrea@yarnandy com kitty cat beanie 2025 page 7 of 8 kitac-tc2510-v1 other patterns you might enjoy eyrie fingerless mittens silver spruce cowl fiery fingerless mittens honeycomb slice cowl houndstooth fingerless mittens malleable beanie subscribe here for email updates andrea@yarnandy com kitty cat beanie 2025 page 8 of 8
